price: 118. Nabiyow:Yi-Rabbow dambi yoh cabaay yoh Racmat, kaadu Atu Racmatta leemik Racmattah yayse Rabbi kinnitok ixxic.
arabic: وَقُل رَّبِّ ٱغۡفِرۡ وَٱرۡحَمۡ وَأَنتَ خَيۡرُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: waqul rabbi igh'fir wa-ir'ḥam wa-anta khayru al-rāḥimīna
